trans-unit.target:
Monster Toss<tab>It's all in the wrist!
Payout: 1-2 points → 20 MGP 3-4 points → 30 MGP 5～ points → 50 MGP<tab><tab>Shots Made

The Moogle's Paw<tab>Seize the day...and the loot!
Payout: Large item → 10 MGP Small item → 25 MGP<tab><tab>

Crystal Tower Striker<tab>Swing with all your might!
Payout: GLANCING! → 10 MGP CRUSHING!! → 15 MGP PULVERIZING!!! → 25 MGP<tab><tab>

Cuff-a-Cur<tab>Aim for the sweet spot!
Payout: BRUISING! → 10 MGP PUNISHING!! → 15 MGP BRUTAL!!! → 25 MGP<tab><tab>

The Finer Miner<tab>Swing to determine the number of mining attempts. The fewer attempts available, the higher the payout!
Titan → 4 times Morbol → 5 times Cactuar → 6 times<tab>Swing the pickaxe to locate the hidden ore. The closer you are, the more the mining gauge is reduced. You win if the gauge reaches zero before you run out of attempts.<tab>MGP Earned

Out on a Limb<tab>Swing to determine the gauge speed. The higher the speed, the higher the payout!
Titan → Very fast Morbol → Fast Cactuar → Slow<tab>Swing the hatchet to locate the hidden timber. The closer you are, the more the gathering gauge is reduced. You win if the gauge reaches zero before you run out of attempts.<tab>MGP Earned
